title: Lava Source Block
desc:
Post 1754
- This card is of the Liquid subtype.
- This card cannot be broken with a tool that's not meant for it.
- When stood on, you begin melting, and draw a card both at the start of your turn, and at the end, until you move away.
- If you are stood on a card of the Wood subtype that is adjacent to this card, you get lit on fire and draw 1 card at the start of each turn until you move away.
- If you place this card adjacent to any (1752) Water Source Block, the water will turn into (788) Stone
